General.Name: Sariguna Primatirta PT
General.Description: PT Sariguna Primatirta Tbk engages in the bottled drinking water business in Indonesia. The company operates through Bottle, Non Bottle, and Others segments. It provides drinking water under the Anda, Cleo Platine, S-Tube, Super O2, Vio 8+, and Cleo Pure Water brand names. The company was formerly known as PT Sari Guna and changed its name to PT Sariguna Primatirta Tbk in December 1988. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Sariguna Primatirta Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tancorp Global Abadi.
General.Address: Jalan Raya Ahmad Yani No. 41-43, Sidoarjo, Indonesia, 61254
